description.p: Fires after the component has been rendered and variable values persisted to Local Storage have been restored.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object with the following properties:

property.name: userData
property.description: An object containing one or more user-defined data values that were persisted to Local Storage.

discussion.p: The *[js:onRestoreVariablesFromLocalStorage]* event will fire after data has been restored from Local Storage. This event handler can access the *[ui:e.userData]* property, which was optionally defined when the [onBeforePersistControlValuesToLocalStorage] event was fired.
